name: ClickUp Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for ClickUp subagent capabilities including task management, spaces, folders, lists, time tracking, and goals. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create task 'Review documentation' in my workspace
items.expected_output: 1. Get workspaces/teams. 2. Get spaces. 3. Get lists. 4. Create task in list.
Get tasks filtered by assignee or from user's workspace.

items.input: get all spaces in my workspace
items.expected_output: 1. Get teams/workspaces. 2. Get spaces for workspace.

items.input: create folder 'Q4 Projects' in Development space
items.expected_output: 1. Get spaces. 2. Find Development space. 3. Create folder.

items.input: add comment to task about login bug
items.expected_output: 1. Search tasks for login bug. 2. Create comment on task.
1. Find task. 2. Update task status to Done.
1. Find project folder. 2. Create list in folder.

items.input: add tag 'urgent' to task about payment
items.expected_output: 1. Find task about payment. 2. Add tag to task.

items.input: get task details for task ID abc123
items.expected_output: Get task by task ID.

items.input: start time tracking on current task
items.expected_output: 1. Find current/active task. 2. Start time entry on task.
Stop running time entry.
1. Find task. 2. Get workspace members. 3. Find sarah. 4. Update task assignee.

items.input: set due date for task to next friday
items.expected_output: 1. Find task. 2. Update task with due_date.

items.input: add subtask 'Write tests' to main task
items.expected_output: 1. Find main task. 2. Create subtask under parent task.
Create goal in workspace.
1. Find Engineering space. 2. Get folders in space.
1. Find task about old feature. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete task.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.input: link task to related task about API
items.expected_output: 1. Find source task. 2. Find related API task. 3. Add task link.
1. Find folder. 2. Get lists in folder.
Add task dependency (blocking/waiting on).
Get time entries filtered for today.
1. Find task. 2. Update task priority.
Get authorized teams and their members.
1. Find space. 2. Create tag in space.
1. Recognize 'clikup' as typo for 'clickup'. 2. Search tasks for 'payment'.
